doc.name: penBack

syntax.example: set the penBack [of object] to colorNumber

doc.summary: Has no effect and is included in LiveCode for compatibility with imported SuperCard projects.

description.p: In SuperCard, the penBack property specifies the color used to draw borders. In LiveCode, the border color is determined by the borderColor property.
The penBack property is always set to empty. A handler can set it to any value without causing a script error, but the actual value is not changed.
